entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
